title: !OINK
creator_credit: Ruth Fleishman and Victoria University EDIM
brief_description: An interactive adaptation of a novel by Melbourne writer Eric Dando, !OINK is an exploration through various stages of life of Squirly Fern. We travel into the details of his life as he tries to find a place for himself in a world of the post-human step family animal/human genetic engineering; alien prototype inventions; corporate ownership od sleep and awake states and technology as a spiritual saviour.
